QuestData.Title: Calming the Storms
QuestData.Description:
These Primalists are relentless, unleashing elemental devastation across the Eastern Kingdoms and Kalimdor.
You must show the same determination, $n. It is the only way to stop them.
Find their next incursion, remove the enemies within the primal storm area before it is too late and foil their efforts.
We must protect Azeroth!
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather $1oa Motes of Primal Energy from enemies in active primal storm locations throughout Kalimdor and the Eastern Kingdoms.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. Let's hope that buys us time before their next incursion.
